title: Spinner
description: Show loading states with the Spinner component.

body.raw:
# Spinner The Spinner component displays a loading indicator to show that content is being loaded or processed. ## Import ```tsx import { Spinner } from '@flexi-ui/spinner' ``` ## Usage ### Basic ```tsx ``` ### With Label ```tsx ``` ### Sizes ```tsx ``` ## API ### Spinner Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | |------|------|---------|-------------| | size | `sm \| md \| lg` | `md` | Size of the spinner | | color | `current \| white \| default \| primary \| secondary \| success \| warning \| error` | `primary` | Color theme | | label | `string` | - | Label text to display | | labelColor | `foreground \| primary \| secondary \| success \| warning \| error` | `foreground` | Label color | | className | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes | | classNames | `object` | - | Custom classes for slots | ### Slots - **base** - The main wrapper - **wrapper** - The spinner wrapper - **circle1** - First circle - **circle2** - Second circle - **label** - The label element ## Examples ### Colors ```tsx ``` ### Sizes ```tsx ``` ### With Different Label Colors ```tsx ``` ### In a Button ```tsx import { Button } from '@flexi-ui/button' ``` ### Full Page Loading ```tsx
``` ### Inline Loading ```tsx
Loading data...
``` ### Card Loading State ```tsx import { Card, CardBody } from '@flexi-ui/card' ``` ### Conditional Loading ```tsx import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function DataLoader() { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { // Simulate data loading setTimeout(() => setIsLoading(false), 2000) }, []) if (isLoading) { return } return
Data loaded!
} ``` ### Custom Styling ```tsx ``` ## Accessibility - Spinners include `role="status"` for screen readers - Loading state is announced to assistive technologies - Labels are properly associated with the spinner - Uses `aria-label` when no visible label is present - Can be used with `aria-live` regions for dynamic content
